text:
Created attachment 26407
test plan config.

There are two request named reqA and reqB, I used jmeter regular expression extractor to get session id from reqA for reqB. This worked correctly on single scene.
When i increase threads using 'loop count', take loop1 and loop2 for example, loop1 is correct; but in loop2, the Regular Expression Extractor parse data from loop1 sometimes.
This can be reproduced while using multiple threads and loop count.

Hello,
Please attach your JMX file.
If you can attach some sample soap response it would also help

Thank you
Regards
Philippe

text:

Test plan that uses RexexpExtractor with SoapSampler

Executing this test plan never produces same Java Request .

You should :
- Check first Your load balancer configuration
- Provide your test plan and log file showing that you get duplicate results


Besides:

- Why do you need session with Webservices
